title: Quality gates + initial release build
description: Add basic checks (fmt/clippy/frontend lint) and verify tauri build works on macOS.

title: TODO extraction + panel
description: Derive TODOs from plan events and/or markdown task lists in assistant messages; display in a dedicated panel.

title: Bug: Tauri invoke args should use camelCase
description: Fix invalid args errors like missing required key sessionId by using camelCase arg names (sessionId/maxLines) when invoking Tauri commands.

title: Bug: Output sometimes appears blank
description: Users report the timeline appears to have no output. Likely caused by filters persisting across sessions or blocks being collapsed by default (reasoning/stderr/raw). Improve UX: default visibility, preview snippets, empty state, and a clear/reset control.

title: Enhancement: Folder picker + remember last cwd
description: Replace hardcoded cwd text box default with a macOS folder picker and persist last-used cwd per session/project.

title: MVP: Codex Warp GUI (macOS)
description: macOS-only Tauri app that runs codex CLI as a subprocess and renders --json JSONL events as Warp-style blocks. Includes session management, TODO panel, and conclusion markdown preview/export.

title: Codex runner + JSONL event streaming
description: Rust backend spawns 'codex exec --json', parses JSONL, persists events, and streams typed events to the UI.

title: Enhancement: Smarter block rendering
description: Improve UI block renderer: coalesce delta events into a single message, render tool/command outputs as expandable blocks, and add search/filter.

title: Enhancement: DMG bundling
description: Re-enable DMG bundling in tauri.conf and fix create-dmg invocation/settings so tauri build can produce a .dmg.

title: Session persistence (list/rename/delete/replay)
description: Store sessions under app data dir (meta + events.jsonl + conclusion.md). Provide UI to list, rename, delete, and replay.

title: Enhancement: Configure codex binary/path
description: In packaged app PATH may not include codex. Add a settings screen to configure codex executable path and validate it.

title: Scaffold Tauri app skeleton
description: Create Tauri+React TS project skeleton, repo hygiene, and basic window layout for blocks + side panels.

title: Upgrade bd CLI (currently v0.37.0)
description: bd doctor warns the repo is using bd CLI v0.37.0 while a newer version exists. Upgrade per beads install script, then rerun 'bd doctor' and 'bd sync' to confirm hooks/sync still work.

title: Configure bd Claude integration (optional)
description: bd doctor reports Claude integration not configured. Decide whether to run 'bd setup claude' or install the beads plugin; if not using Claude, close as wontfix.
notes: Installed Claude Code hooks via 'bd setup claude --stealth' (global) and '--project --stealth' (project). 'bd setup claude --check' passes; bd doctor v0.37.0 still warns (likely fixed by CLI upgrade).

title: Bug: Session switch/rename/delete + continue
description: 1) Switching sessions should reliably show prior output (including stderr). 2) Rename/Delete should work in Tauri (avoid window.prompt/confirm). 3) Run in composer should continue the selected session by default; New explicitly starts a new session.

title: Conclusion markdown preview + export
description: Write final answer to conclusion.md via codex flag and render markdown preview; allow quick open/export.
